name: Bolt The Robot
description:
There's a curious little cave just off the coast and Bolt wants to discover its secrets. help guide them through the chambers of busted screens, heavy boxes, magnetic fields and pull platforms!

Controls:

A/D or Arrow keys left/right - Moves left or right!

W or Up arrow - Jump!

Space - Hold down to effect objects and let go of space to release or even repel them! Some objects might require a full charge to blast them away!

Story:

Bolt is looking for something. They are aware of it, but don't quite understand it. Not even its name. It is believed that a greater understanding can be found within a cave that once held a secret facility. Nowadays, it's a bit of a mess, but if you look hard enough, you might just find the answers.
